property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains X life. • Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity." - D'Avenant proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amrou Kithkin can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quick and agile, Amrou Kithkin can usually escape from even the most fearsome opponents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as it's your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant Wall Enchanted Wall can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalia has a complex caste system that changes with the lunar year. No matter what the season, the only caste that cannot be attained by either heredity or money is that of the Hero.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black. This effect doesn't remove Black Ward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {W}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from blue. This effect doesn't remove Blue Ward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not your friends; they despise you. I'm the only one you can count on. Trust me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: The next time an artifact source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Conversion unless you pay {W}{W}. All Mountains are Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Glory surged through her and radiance surrounded her. All things were possible with the blessing of the Divine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, trample When Elder Land Wurm blocks, it loses defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's best to let sleeping dragons lie.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from green. This effect doesn't remove Green Ward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before a woman marries in the village of Sursi, she must visit the land of the Mesa Pegasus. Legend has it that if the woman is pure of heart and her love is true, a Mesa Pegasus will appear, blessing her family with long life and good fortune.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After Lacjsi's speech, the Knights grew determined to crush their ancient enemies clan by clan." - Tivadar of Thorn, History of the Goblin Wars

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look to the north; there you will find aid and comfort."The Book of Tal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures. Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Do you know, I always thought Unicorns were fabulous monsters, too? I never saw one alive before' ‘Well, now that we have seen each other,' said the Unicorn, ‘if you'll believe in me, I'll believe in you.'" - Lewis Carroll

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Only Personal Incarnation's owner may activate this ability. When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half their life, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whoever obeys God and His Prophet, fears God and does his duty to Him, will surely find success." - The Qur'an, 24:52

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the cavalry bore down, we faced them with swords drawn and pikes hidden in the grass at our feet. ‘Don't lift your pikes 'til I give the word,' I said." - Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target spell or permanent becomes white. +lt;I+gt;(Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from red. This effect doesn't remove Red Ward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The traditional kings of the jungle command a healthy respect in other climates as well. Relying mainly on their stealth and speed, Savannah Lions can take a victim by surprise, even in the endless, flat plains of their homeland.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. You may then have that player shuffle that library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Visions of glory, spare my aching sight, Ye unborn ages, crowd not on my soul" - Thomas Gray, "The Bard"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as the evil ones approached to slay Justina, she cast a great spell, imbuing her weapons with her own life force. Thus she fulfilled the prophecy: "In the death of your savior will you find salvation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the Knight had just laid waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from white. This effect doesn't remove White Ward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, Creature Bond deals damage equal to that creature's toughness to the creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, destroy that land unless that player pays {1} or 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant enchantment At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, Feedback deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield." - Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . And gives to airy nothing A local habitation and a name." - William Shakespeare, A Midsummer-Night's Dream

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That phantom prow split the storm as lightning cast its long shadow on the battlefield below." - Mireille Gaetane, The Valeriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all artifacts target player owns to their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This spell, like many attributed to Drafna, was actually the work of his wife and former student, Hurkyl.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Island Fish Jasconius doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap Island Fish Jasconius. Island Fish Jasconius can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Island Fish Jasconius.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. +lt;I+gt;(For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti Djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap all lands target player controls and that player loses all unspent mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most human scholars believe that Merfolk are the survivors of sunken Atlantis, humans adapted to the water. Merfolk, however, believe that humans sprang forth from Merfolk who adapted themselves in order to explore their last frontier.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards they discarded this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While, like a ghastly rapid river, Through the pale door, A hideous throng rush out forever, And laugh - but smile no more." - Edgar Allan Poe, "The Haunted Palace"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to any target. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant enchantment At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Power Leak deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creatures of the Æther are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact an opponent controls Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one - • Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Target player gains 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Leviathan, too Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?" - Job 40:25

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn, before attackers are declared. Creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy all non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Ignore this effect for each creature the player didn't control continuously since the beginning of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. +lt;I+gt;(For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players skip their untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact You control enchanted artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}. Blue creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target spell or permanent becomes blue. +lt;I+gt;(Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you. {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy X target Mountains. Volcanic Eruption deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of Mountains put into a graveyard this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This ‘standing windstorm' can hold us off indefinitely? Ridiculous" Saying nothing, she put a pinch of salt on the table. With a bang she clapped her hands, and the salt disappeared, blown away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {U}: Wall of Water gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A deafening roar arose as the fury of an enormous vertical river supplanted our serenity. Eddies turned into whirling geysers, leveling everything in their path.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unpredictable as the sea itself, Water Elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All rivers eventually run to the sea. My job is to sort out who goes first." - Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On guard for larger dangers, we underestimated the power and speed of the Imp's muck-crusted claws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 'Twas in the bogs of Cannelbrae My mate did meet an early grave 'Twas nothing left for us to save In the peat-filled bogs of Cannelbrae.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War is no picnic," my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Cosmic Horror unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}. If Cosmic Horror is destroyed this way, it deals 7 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . Screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target spell or permanent becomes black. +lt;I+gt;(Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bones scattered around us joined to form misshapen bodies. We struck at them repeatedly - they fell, but soon formed again, with the same mocking look on their faceless skulls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever El-Hajjâj deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Frozen Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are some qualities, some incorporate things, / That have a double life, which thus is made / A type of twin entity which springs / From matter and light, evinced in solid and shade." - Edgar Allan Poe, "Silence"

property.name: Rules
property.value: White spells cost {3} more to cast. Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires. . . . And there is no greater disaster than greed." - Tao Tê Ching 46

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . There was no trace Of aught on that illumined face . . . ." - Samuel Coleridge, "Phantom"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junún Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name - But those who go with her are never the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Comes right outta th' ground. If ya can smell it, it's too late." - Keevy Bogsbury

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Raganorn unsealed the catacombs, he found more than the dead and their treasures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Shadow is in your graveyard with three or more creature cards above it, you may put Nether Shadow onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Nightmare arises from its lair in the swamps. As the poisoned land spreads, so does the Nightmare's rage and terrifying strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Paralyze enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {4}. If the player does, untap the creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. +lt;I+gt;(A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Plague Rats's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures named Plague Rats on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the dark times, the rats seemed to grow ever stronger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals their hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aw, he's just a silly, dirty little man. What's to be afraid of?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trained in the arts of stealth, the Royal Assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose, Nor spake, nor moved their eyes; It had been strange, even in a dream, To have seen those dead men rise." - Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature that died this turn. Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain life equal to the damage dealt to you this turn. Simulacrum deals damage to target creature you control equal to the damage dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Solitude drove the old hermit insane. Now he only keeps company with those he can catch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For something is amiss or out of place When mice with wings can wear a human face." - Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {B}: Regenerate Wall of Bone. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Wall of Bone is said to be an aspect of the Great Wall in Hel, where the bones of all sinners wait for Ragnarok, when Hela will call them forth for the final battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "About, about in reel and rout The death-fires danced at night; The water, like a witch's oils, Burnt green, and blue and white." - Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That was the worst experience of my days: standing there helpless as they killed my whole troop." - Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Until your next upkeep, target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When he reached the entrance of the cavern, he pronounced the words, ‘Open, Sesame'" - The Arabian Nights, Junior Classics trans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart, A radiant brow and tresses that beguile And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile." - The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

property.name: Rules
property.value: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire is never a gentle master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Cave People attacks, it gets +1/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target spell or permanent becomes red. +lt;I+gt;(Its mana symbols remain unchanged.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}, {T}: Crimson Manticore deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Noted neither for their good looks nor their charm, Manticores can be fearsome allies.As dinner companions, however, they are best left alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact with mana value X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Disintegrate deals X damage to any target. If it's a creature, it can't be regenerated this turn, and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O to be a dragon . . . of silkworm size or immense . . ."Marianne Moore, "O to Be a Dragon"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Earth Elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Warriors of the Tsunami-nito School spend years in training to master the way of effortless effort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire Elementals are ruthless infernos, annihilating and consuming their foes in a frenzied holocaust. Crackling and blazing, they sear swift, terrible paths, leaving the land charred and scorched in their wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And topples round the dreary west A looming bastion fringed with fire." - Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "In Memoriam"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?" - Plato

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "O it is excellent To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous To use it like a giant." - William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To become king of the Goblins, one must assassinate the previous king. Thus, only the most foolish seek positions of leadership.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Goblin Rock Sled doesn't untap during your untap step if it attacked during your last turn. Goblin Rock Sled can't attack unless defending player controls a Mountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Ogre philosopher Gnerdel believed the purpose of life was to live as high on the food chain as possible. She refused to eat vegetarians, preferring to live entirely on creatures that preyed on sentient beings.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fortunately, Hill Giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames." - Mairsil, called the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Generations of genetic weeding have given rise to the deviously cowardly Ironclaw clan. To say that Orcs in general are vicious, depraved, and ignoble does not do justice to the Ironclaw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures they control and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The intricate dynamics of Rundvelt Goblin affairs are often confused with anarchy. The chaos, however, is the chaos of a thundercloud, and direction will sporadically and violently appear. Pashalik Mons and his Raiders are the thunderhead that leads in the storm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a rare display of ingenuity, the Orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most Orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Power Surge deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands they controlled at the beginning of this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hi ni ya Behold the man of flint, that's me Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return." - Navajo war chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We are many wicks sharing a common tallow; we feed the skies with the ashes of our prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove Tempest Efreet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Tempest Efreet: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, they reveal a card at random from their hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. {R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Union may be strength, but it is mere blind brute strength unless wisely directed." - Samuel Butler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere, Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near, Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear." - Troll chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Dust blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An ever-moving swarm of dust engulfs and disorients anything that comes near.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Conjured from the bowels of hell, the fiery wall forms an impassable barrier, searing the soul of any creature attempting to pass through its terrible bursts of flame.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Earth herself lends her strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Tis the set of sails, and not the gales, Which tells us the way to go." - Ella Wheeler Wilcox

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion." - Vervamon the Elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most terrifying thing about the Craw Wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirits of Argoth grant new life to those who repent the folly of enslaving their labors to devices.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine: and the herd ran violently . . . ." - Mark 5:13

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm." - Elven proverb

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I tell you, there was so many arrows flying about you couldn't hardly see the sun. So I says to young Angus, "Well, at least now we're fighting in the shade"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rather than sheltering her young, the female Fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls. {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it possesses potent venom, the Giant Spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't try to outrun one of Dominia's Grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can attack as though it had haste. {0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mating habits of Treefolk, particularly the stalwart Ironroot Treefolk, are truly absurd. Molasses comes to mind. It's amazing the species can survive at all given such protracted periods of mate selection, conjugation, and gestation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The communal mind produces a savage strategy, yet no one could predict that this vicious crossbreed would unravel the secret of steel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The standard cure for leeches requires the application of burning embers. Alternative methods must be devised should an ember of sufficient size prove more harmful than the leech." - Vervamon the Elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After years of training, the Druid becomes one with nature, drawing power form the land and returning it when needed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target spell or permanent becomes green. +lt;I+gt;(Mana symbols on that permanent remain unchanged.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many vitality counters on Living Artifact. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a vitality counter from Living Artifact. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hardened by their life in the haunted Llanowar Forest, these fierce beings are outcasts among elvenkind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Marsh Viper deals damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All we had left were their black and bloated bodies." - Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Nafs Asp deals damage to a player, that player loses 1 life at the beginning of their next draw step unless they pay {1} before that draw step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove Rebirth from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Each player may ante the top card of their library. If a player does, that player's life total becomes 20.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the Faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moving without sound, swift figures pass through branches and undergrowth completely unhindered. One with the trees around them, the Dryads of Shanodin Forest are seen only when they wish to be.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the Basilisk's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though many think of Wolves as solitary predators, they are actually extremely social animals. During a hunt they often call to each other, which can be quite unsettling for their prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each noncreature artifact loses all abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. If Titania's Song leaves the battlefield, this effect continues until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy the other creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I told him it was just a flesh wound, but the next time I looked at him, poor Tadhg was dead and gone." - Maeveen O'Donagh, Memoirs of a Soldier

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say magic was first practiced by women, who have always felt strong ties to the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {G}: Regenerate Wall of Brambles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What else, when chaos draws all forces inward to shape a single leaf." - Conrad Aiken

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And through the drifts the snowy cliffs Did send a dismal sheen: Nor shapes of men nor beasts we ken - The ice was all between." - Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everybody knows that to ward off trouble, you knock on wood. But usually it's better to make a wall out of the wood and let trouble do the knocking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I didn't think Mammoths could ever hold a candle to a well-trained battle horse. Then one day I turned my back on a drunken soldier. His blow never landed; Mi'cha flung the brute over ten meters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black At the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks rage blow" - William Shakespeare, King Lear

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your library, put all but one of them on the bottom of your library in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After these words the magician drew a ring off his finger, and put it on one of Aladdin's, saying: ‘It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"The Arabian Nights, Junior Classics trans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a doom counter on Armageddon Clock. At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player. {4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Ashnod's Battle Gear during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/-2 for as long as Ashnod's Battle Gear remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This invention shows why Ashnod was feared by her troops as well as her foes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Battering Ram gains banding until end of combat. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's blocking.) Whenever Battering Ram becomes blocked by a Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time Mishra was defeated, no mage was foolish enough to rely heavily on walls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Black Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Black Mana Battery: Add {B}, then add an additional {B} for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Blue Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Blue Mana Battery: Add {U}, then add an additional {U} for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove Bronze Tablet from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. Bronze Tablet enters the battlefield tapped. {4}, {T}: Exile Bronze Tablet and target nontoken permanent an opponent owns. That player may pay 10 life. If they do, put Bronze Tablet into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player owns Bronze Tablet and you own the other exiled card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos won fame as Urza's greatest assistant. After he created these warriors, Urza ended his apprenticeship, promoting him directly to the rank of master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step. {9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the Sardian mountains wakes ancient doom: Warrior born from a rocky womb.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Cursed Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. The chosen player's maximum hand size is four.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ashnod invented several torture techniques that could make victims even miles away beg for mercy as if the End had come.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning." - Sevti Mukul, The Fall of Alsoor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who believed the city of Kroog would never fall to Mishra's forces severely underestimated the might of his war machines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you have that I cannot obtain?" - Mairsil, called the Pretender

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Recent research suggests these creatures were invented by Urza's and Mishra's original master, Tocasia, and that both brothers used them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Green Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Green Mana Battery: Add {G}, then add an additional {G} for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Valuing scholarship above all else, the inhabitants of the Ivory Tower reward those who sacrifice power for knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each day of their journey, Jandor opened the saddlebags and found them full of mutton, quinces, cheese, date rolls, wine, and all manner of delicious and satisfying foods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More than one mage was driven insane by the sound of the Millstone relentlessly grinding away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Mishra's War Machine deals 3 damage to you unless you discard a card. If Mishra's War Machine deals damage to you this way, tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ." - Song of the Artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many scholars believe that these creatures were the result of Urza's first attempt at mechanical life, perhaps created in his early days as an apprentice to Tocasia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Red Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Red Mana Battery: Add {R}, then add an additional {R} for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose a number between 0 and 7. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7. Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may spend white mana as though it were red mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When war machines became too costly, Tawnos's Weaponry replaced them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tetravus enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from Tetravus. If you do, create that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens. They each have flying and "This creature can't be enchanted." At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens created with Tetravus. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tetravus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Invented in Mishra's earlier days, the Rack was once his most feared creation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A brainchild of Tawnos, the Triskelion later proved both versatile and useful.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: Urza's Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of banding, flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unable to settle on just one design, Urza decided to create one versatile being.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikemen held off a trio of rampaging Craw Wurms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on White Mana Battery. {T}, Remove any number of charge counters from White Mana Battery: Add {W}, then add an additional {W} for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.
